apis.name: Get Supplier Payables
apis.description: Retrieves supplier payables information including invoices, payments, balances for contractors and material suppliers. Shows paid amounts, outstanding balances, GST amounts, due dates, and invoice details. Useful for financial queries about supplier payments, outstanding balances, invoice tracking, and payment history.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The project ID to filter payables

parameters.name: supplierId
parameters.description: Specific supplier ID, use -1 for all suppliers

examples: Show me all outstanding supplier payments
What is the total amount owed to suppliers?
List all invoices from Alpha Structures
How much have we paid to contractors?
Show supplier payment balance for project 165
apis.response_description: Returns array of supplier payables with fields: paid (amount paid), balance (outstanding amount), invoice_id, invoice_no, gst_amount, grossAmount, supplier (name), type (Contract work/Material/etc), due_date, amount (total). Also includes totalPayable and totalPaid summary.
